scripts.copyproduction: cross-var copyfiles package.json production && copyfiles .npmrc production && cd ./production && npm install --production && cd .. && cross-var copyfiles -u 1 "./production/node_modules/**/*" $npm_package_config_servicename && rimraf production/
scripts.copyfiles: cross-var copyfiles service.json dist/* $npm_package_config_servicename && npm run copyproduction
scripts.copyandzip: cross-var npm run copyfiles && npm run zip && cross-var rimraf $npm_package_config_servicename
